TEXT.English: The people of %s1 have joined the rising civilization of %s2. How should we respond?
Accept their decision.
Declare war and reconquer them!
%d1 of our units have been expelled from %s2 territory and withdrawn to %s3.
[H2]A new civilization is being born[\H2][NEWLINE]Do you wish to take permanent control of the %s1 civilization?
TEXT.French: [H2]Naissance d'une nouvelle civilisation[\H2][NEWLINE]Voulez-vous prendre le contrôle permanent de la civilisation %s1:2 ?
TEXT.German: [H2]Eine neue Zivilisation entsteht[\H2][NEWLINE]Wollt Ihr die permanente Kontrolle über das %s1:3 Volk übernehmen?
TEXT.Italian: [H2]Nasce una nuova civiltà[\H2][NEWLINE]Vuoi assumere il controllo permanente della civiltà %s1:2?
TEXT.Spanish: [H2]Ha nacido una nueva civilización[\H2][NEWLINE]¿Deseas tomar el control permanente de la civilización %s1:2?

TEXT.English: We are receiving reports that the rise of the %s1 civilization is imminent.
Colonists in America are embracing enlightenment ideas and calling for representation and an end to unjust taxation.
Adherents of the prophet Mohammad are growing in strength among the Bedouins of Arabia.
The provinces of the Rio de la Plata have formed a congress to declare independence from their motherland.
Nahua speaking peoples are migrating into the Valley of Mexico looking for their prophesied new homeland.
The colonial royal family is establishing an independent branch in Brazil.
The establishment of a second Roman capital in Byzantium is cementing the split of the Roman Empire into west and east.
Colonial rulers are considering acts that would result in a self-governing confederation in Canada.
Independent cities of Phoenician traders are beginning to form along the Levantine coast.
First kingdoms are starting to develop along the Yellow River.
Simón Bolívar is rallying pro-independence forces in the colony of New Granada.
The rulers of Wessex are close to unifying all the Anglo-Saxons in England into one kingdom.
Successors of the old Kingdom of D'mot are about to establish a kingdom in the Ethiopian highlands.
The ascent of the Carolingian dynasty is transforming the kingdom of the Franks into a Frankish Empire.
Succession conflicts are making a unified Frankish Empire untenable, and its German parts are looking for their own ruler.
Mycenaean city states are beginning to develop around the coast of the Aegean.
Unifying its Prussian and Brandenburgian holdings, the Kingdom of Prussia is about to become a new European great power.
The Cusco tribe is expanding beyond its home valley to begin establishing the Inca Empire.
Aryan peoples are migrating into the Indo-Gangetic plain and founding their own kingdoms.
Indianized kingdoms are beginning to develop in Indonesia around the trade along the Strait of Malacca.
The Safaviyya movement is fighting to restore Shi'a Islam and native Persian rule to the Iranian plateau.
Italian city states are asserting their independence from the Emperor and forming independent republics.
Religion and administration spreading to Japan are accelerating the formation of a Japanese empire.
The ruler of Chenla is building the new capital of Angkor to found the Khmer Empire.
The inhabitants of the Congo river delta are establishing their first centralized kingdom.
The three kingdoms of Silla, Baekje, and Goguryeo are growing on the Korean peninsula.
Trade of salt and gold across the Sahara is spurring the establishment of an empire in Mali.
Independent city states are developing on the Yucatan peninsula.
Officers in colonial Mexico are gathering forces to achieve independence.
Khan Temujin is subjugating and unifying the tribes of the Mongol steppe.
The ousted ruler of the Ummayad dynasty is ready to cross the Strait of Gibraltar and establish a seat of power in Iberia.
Rulers of the powerful Muslim Ghurid dynasty are preparing to push into northern India.
The Dutch people are fighting to establish their own republic in the Netherlands.
The Ottoman Beylik is gathering strength to subjugate Anatolia and capture the Bosphorus.
Persian tribes are migrating into the Iranian plateau.
After the Poles have adopted Christianity, they are about to be recognized as a kingdom.
The rulers of Tonga have extended their influences far across the Polynesian islands.
The County of Portugal is reclaiming land from Al-Andalus and getting closer to founding a kingdom.
The Latin people of Italy have begun settling the city of Rome.
Varangian nobles are intermingling with the Slavic population of eastern Europe and establishing Rus principalities.
The last surviving Christian kingdom in Iberia is preparing to reconquer the peninsula from Muslim control.
The Tamils are forming mercantile kingdoms along the southern coast of India.
The Thais of the Sukhotai Kingdom have taken control of the Chao Phraya basin.
The different Tibetan kingdoms are unifying into an empire.
The Gokturks are rebelling against the Rouran Khaganate.
Norse raiders are beginning to venture out of Scandinavia.
An army of the expanding %s1 has been sighted marching towards %s2!
